story:
Texas has experienced historically 
drastic drops in temperature over the 
years the most notorious being the 
Great Blizzard of 1899.

NTSB joins investigation into fatal 
plane collision at Texas airshow. 
Investigators searching for any clues 
that may have lead to the crash.

Veterinarians discover highly-
contagious canine influenza in Central 
Texas. There is a “decent-sized 
outbreak” of the H3N2 strain.
